Review_title: One of the best Brazilian comedians
Review_Text: (The low rate comes probably from WASPs.)The show is brilliant, Yuri has a modern and intelligent sense of humor. He talks about his life, his family and his childhood in a low class neighborhood in Brazil. He also talks about religion ("Why was Jesus probably black?") and racism in a smart and funny way. He deserves more Netflix specials like that.I highly recommend!
